vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προσανα-τίθημι,
offer or dedicate besides, δηνάρια πεντακισχίλια [Refs]; τῷ θεῷ -τεθεικὼς ἅπαντα [Refs 4th c.AD+]ad Them.267b; τὴν παρθενίαν θεῷ [Refs] see at {Πουλχερία}:—middle, take an additional burden on oneself, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; but π. τινί τι contribute of oneself to another, [NT]
__2 ascribe, τινί τι [Refs 3rd c.AD+]
__II προσανατίθεσθαί τινι take counsel with one, [NT+3rd c.BC+]; refer a matter for consideration, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to add; to consult, ask adviceconfer
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to add; to consult, ask adviceconfer
occurs in the NT only as a middle, to lay upon over and above; middle to put one's self in free communication with, to confer with, consult with Gal. 1:16; to confer upon, to propound as a matter of consideration, Gal. 2:6*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: hỏi ý kiến; bắt buộc. πρός (G4314) + ἀνατίθημι (G394)
